component.text: That is incorrect. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity – Check Your Understanding of ACLs

Click Buttons 2-6 to complete the activity. Click Button 1 to view this topology at any time. To continue, select Button 2 now.

Activity – Check Your Understanding of ACLs

Question 1 – A single access list needs to be created to deny the 10.10.1.0/24 network and the 10.10.20.0/24 network from reaching the 10.10.30.0/24 network. The host 10.10.1.1 should have access to the FTP server only. The rest of the 10.0.0.0 network should have access to the 10.10.30.0/24 network. All devices should be able to access the Internet. Click Button 3 to continue.
What should be the first line of the new access list described in the practice scenario above?

Activity – Check Your Understanding of ACLs

Question 2 – A single access list needs to be created to deny the 10.10.1.0/24 network and the 10.10.20.0/24 network from reaching the 10.10.30.0/24 network. The host 10.10.1.1 should have access to the FTP server only. The rest of the 10.0.0.0 network should have access to the 10.10.30.0/24 network. All devices should be able to access the Internet. Click Button 4 to continue.
What should be the second line of the new access list described in the practice scenario above?

Activity – Check Your Understanding of ACLs

Question 3 – A single access list needs to be created to deny the 10.10.1.0/24 network and the 10.10.20.0/24 network from reaching the 10.10.30.0/24 network. The host 10.10.1.1 should have access to the FTP server only. The rest of the 10.0.0.0 network should have access to the 10.10.30.0/24 network. All devices should be able to access the Internet. Click Button 5 to continue.
What should be the third line of the new access list described in the practice scenario above?
Router(config)# access-list 101 permit ip host 10.10.1.1 host 10.10.30.1 eq ftp
Router(config)# access-list 101 permit ip host 10.10.1.1 10.10.30.0 0.0.0.255 eq any

Activity – Check Your Understanding of ACLs

Question 4 – A single access list needs to be created to deny the 10.10.1.0/24 network and the 10.10.20.0/24 network from reaching the 10.10.30.0/24 network. The host 10.10.1.1 should have access to the FTP server only. The rest of the 10.0.0.0 network should have access to the 10.10.30.0/24 network. All devices should be able to access the Internet. Click Button 6 to continue.
What should be the fourth line of the new access list described in the practice scenario above?

Activity – Check Your Understanding of ACLs

Question 5 – A single access list needs to be created to deny the 10.10.1.0/24 network and the 10.10.20.0/24 network from reaching the 10.10.30.0/24 network. The host 10.10.1.1 should have access to the FTP server only. The rest of the 10.0.0.0 network should have access to the 10.10.30.0/24 network. All devices should be able to access the Internet.
Where should the new access list described in the practice scenario above be placed to ensure it is effective?
S 0/2/0 on RTB as an outbound list
G 0/0 on RTB as an outbound list
G 0/1 on RTA as an inbound list
G 0/1 on RTA as an inbound list
